name: Adventure Time: Hey Ice King! Why'd You Steal Our Garbage?! - Collector's Edition
summary:
Collector's Edition Includes:
Custom package design of the Enchiridion in a premium SteelBook case
Limited edition replica stylus of Finn's Gold Sword
Exclusive 'Book of Beasts' bestiary
Bonus poster map of the Land of Ooo
Includes the Adventure Time: Hey Ice King! Why'd you steal our garbage?! video game
